## âœ… Content Compliance Checklist

### Educational Content Rules

- [ ] **Zero-Copy Policy**: Content is transformative, not copied verbatim
- [ ] **File Length**: Content â‰¤150 lines (or properly split)
- [ ] **YAML Frontmatter**: All required metadata fields present
  - [ ] `learning_level`
  - [ ] `prerequisites`
  - [ ] `estimated_time`
  - [ ] `learning_objectives`
  - [ ] `related_topics` (with `enables:` key)
- [ ] **File Naming**: Follows semantic naming conventions
- [ ] **File References**: All references point to existing files
- [ ] **Content Placement**: Content is in correct directory

### Technical Quality

- [ ] **Markdown Linting**: Passes markdownlint checks
- [ ] **File References**: No broken references
- [ ] **Encoding**: UTF-8 encoding (no replacement characters)
- [ ] **Diagrams**: Mermaid-first with ASCII fallback (if applicable)
- [ ] **Code Examples**: Minimal, illustrative, with language specification

### Review Checklist

- [ ] Content follows [Educational Content Rules](.cursor/rules/01_educational-content-rules.mdc)
- [ ] File naming follows [File Naming Conventions](.cursor/rules/07_file-naming-conventions.mdc)
- [ ] Learning objectives are clear and measurable
- [ ] Content adds educational value
- [ ] No placeholder patterns in YAML
- [ ] All prerequisites/enables relationships are valid
